list_of_reviews.review_title: Support team have no accountability
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange and it's support team seems to think ERC20 and Ethereum Mainnet are synonymous. They are not. There are many chains that support ERC20 tokens. On Bybit's deposit page, they list ERC20 as a "Chain" you can deposit to, which is completely ambiguous because many chains support ERC20. Once you deposit your funds to a chain that supports ERC20 (In my case Base chain), they do not show up, because the only supported chain is actually Ethereum Mainnet, and the support team take no accountability. This is extremely poor...I spent 3 days arguing with support about whether the name of Ethereum Mainnet is ERC20 or not. list_of_reviews.review_title: Urgent Assistance Needed: Bybit Account Review

I believe my client's wallet has been involved in a scam, but I was unaware of this. That wallet does not belong to me. I have screenshots (dialogues with my client) proving that it is not mine, and I don't understand why I am being blamed.Please, for Allah's sake, help me. I am 22 years old, and I have invested all my savings in Bybit for over a year. My money, including my family's, is currently temporarily restricted. list_of_reviews.review_title: No response to Support Case and frozen funds!
list_of_reviews.review: Case ID: 09810204Bybit UID: 121119390I recently contacted Bybit's support team to relinquish my status as a P2P Merchant and to release my frozen funds amounting to 1000 USD. Unfortunately, my experience has been extremely frustrating and disappointing.Despite clearly outlining my request, I did not receive any response from the support team. To make matters worse, my case was prematurely marked as "solved" without any resolution. My funds remain frozen, and my status as a P2P Merchant has not been changed.What is particularly concerning is that my case has been neglected for over a week without any acknowledgment or action. This prolonged lack of communication and failure to address my issue is unacceptable. As a result, I am compelled to give Bybit a 1-star rating due to the poor handling of my case. It is crucial for a platform to have responsive and effective customer support, and Bybit has fallen short in this regard.I hope that Bybit takes this feedback seriously and improves their support services to prevent such issues in the future!!!!UPDATE: Bybit has responded to me and was able to solve my issue. Although it took some time for the problem to be resolved, it was ultimately fixed accurately and satisfactorily. As a result, I will be increasing my rating.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for bybit.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Key phrases: "lack of personal engagement," "account closures," "inconsistent support," "partnerships," "technological advancements," "educational initiatives." These indicate common concerns about customer service and account management, while praise focuses on innovation and educational efforts.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The average rating is 3.2, calculated from ratings 5, 2, 3, 5, and 1. The distribution shows mixed satisfaction with varied user experiences: two high ratings (5), one moderate (3), and two low (2 and 1).

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Summary: Users find the platform trustworthy and user-friendly but are frustrated by account closures and inconsistent support, leading to mixed satisfaction and an average rating of 3.2.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews emphasize partnerships, technological advancements, and educational initiatives. Negative reviews focus on lack of personal engagement, account closures, and inconsistent support. Key differentiators are genuine advancements versus perceived automated promotion and inconsistent customer service.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the bybit.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: A review dated January 04, 2024, initially rated Bybit poorly due to slow issue resolution but later increased the rating after the support team resolved the problem accurately and satisfactorily, indicating eventual effectiveness and responsiveness.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews reveal a mixed user experience with notable themes of partnerships, technological advancements, and educational initiatives being positively highlighted. However, critical issues such as lack of personal engagement, account closures, and inconsistent customer support are frequently mentioned as areas of concern. The feedback suggests a dichotomy between genuine advancements and perceived automated promotion, which may affect user trust. To improve, the company should focus on enhancing personal engagement and ensuring consistent, reliable customer support. Further investigation into the authenticity of promotional content and addressing the reasons behind account closures could also be beneficial.
